name: GravityGolf
description:
General Description.

GravityGolf is designed for mobile devices. Currently it is a work in progress. In "GravityGolf" your challenge is to direct the ball in to the goal... with the power of Gravityfields, which can attract the ball or push it away, while your shooting direction is predetermined.

Controls:

Ball:

  • Click on the ball and hold
  • Drag your mouse away from the ball to determine the speed
  • Release mouse button to fire the ball

Gravityfields:

  • At the bottom of each level (except Level 1-3) you see the Gravityfieldcounter
  • Drag fields from this counter into the level
  • Adjust the strength and the type (+/-) with the slider above the field

Team:

Grigory Gusev

Nino Brugger

Onur Özkan

Kleo Kreitz
